title: Create a set of test API responses
body:
We talked with QA during the Hawaii workweek, and in order to facilitate their testing of the system add-on, @mythmon and I came up with a set of interesting test cases to cover:

- Filter Expression targeting
  - Documented normandy attributes (channel, geolocation, version, etc.)
  - Sampling 100% and 0%
  - Telemetry packet attributes
- Basic `console-log` execution
- Basic `heartbeat` execution
  - 5 star rating
  - Engagement button
- Extreme cases
  - Giant filter expression
  - `console-log` with a very large message
  - `show-heartbeat`
    - Very large arguments
    - With an ad blocker installed that resets localstorage on reboot
- Error cases
  - Service unavailable
  - Malformed JSON
  - Invalid signature

We should come up with the response JSON we'd expect from the service in each of these test cases, which will help us set up a test server with fake responses that QA can use in their manual testing.

* [x] #448 Re-enable mock-recipe-server in CI
